summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation charges for services rendered to J Epstein & Co Inc. The invoice includes various charges for shipping and handling, with multiple entries for different shipments made by the company. It highlights the total charges and provides a breakdown of costs associated with each shipment.
